summary: Part VII of the "Why We Fight" series of wartime documentaries. This entry attempts to describe the factors leading up to America's entry into the Second World War.
cast: Dean Acheson|General Bergeret|A.A. Berle|Arno Breker|Neville Chamberlain|Winston Churchill|Galeazzo Ciano|Édouard Daladier|Charles Edison|Francisco Franco|Joseph Goebbels|Hermann Göring|Rudolf Hess|Heinrich Himmler|Hirohito|Adolf Hitler|Cordell Hull|Charles Huntziger|Walter Huston|Hiram Johnson|Wilhelm Keitel|Fritz Kuhn|Saburo Kurusu|Admiral Le Luc|Charles A. Lindbergh|Viktor Lutze|Andrew J. May|Edward R. Murrow|Benito Mussolini|Lloyd Nolan|Kichisaburo Nomura|Léon Noël|Gerald P. Nye|Erich Raeder|Franklin D. Roosevelt|Haile Selassie|Albert Speer|Henry L. Stimson|Elbert D. Thomas|Hideki Tojo|Paul von Hindenburg|Joachim von Ribbentrop|Wendell Willkie
keywords: propaganda|why we fight documentary series|claim in title|world war two|world history
title: War Comes to America
